replies.body: So I just bought Diana for 900 and now look how cheap she is couldn't you have gave us a notice a bit before
Why would you buy a champ with RP at all? Such a waste, save RP for things like skins or bundles or something, I would only ever buy a champ with IP.
same here

yup ive never bought a rp person only skins 
ihave {{champion:103}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:75}} skins all  for them

How much notice do you want? Like, do you want a year long calendar? Just be thankful these schedules come out at all.
why spend 900 RP for a champ?  better off buying a skin and waiting for sales
or 2 skins
they did this is for sales in July and its still June, don't complain about not having a warning
Are you for real? This is the warning. You are lucky they even do this.
ikr
I believe if you message riot support they'll refund you the price difference as long as it's within two weeks (or at least it's the case with skins)
So, when is these 'sales' going to end because my birthday is on July the 26th and I am going to get RP, so I was just wandering if I had enough time. Anyone know?

It's the regular sale schedule (3-4 days for each set of 3 skins/champs), just that they are telling us in advance they will happen sometime during July. That way you can be prepared and check the store often during the month.
I think it goes for all of July but i'm not sure
Okay, thanks!
If you read the article it says they'll be on sale next month -.-
